attributes.action: Details of Chagos Islands Agreement should be made public
attributes.additional_details: All negotiations and agreements including the costs to British taxpayers should be published.
attributes.background: A full transparent public enquiry should be held on the details of the agreement to surrender sovereignty of the Chagos Islands

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/701675
